Hotel.HotelName: Westgate Las Vegas Resort and Casino
Hotel.Brochurecontent: Westgate Las Vegas Resort and Casino, formerly The LVH, is a glamorous, casino resort hotel with a wealth of amenities situated just off the Strip, next to the Convention Centre. Featuring a swimming pool, fitness centre, tennis courts and 9 hole putting green. Home to 12 restaurants, casino, night club and show room and offering a choice of 2,176 spacious and stylishly appointed rooms.

Live the life of a high roller at the Stratosphere Las Vegas Hotel & Casino. Home of the Stratosphere Tower, jutting 1,149 feet into the Vegas skyline, this is the tallest observation tower in the U.S. Venture to the top and you're in for a surprise - as you'll find several rollercoaster and thrill rides ... on the top of the tower!

Circus Circus has been a family favourite for years. A classic hotel/casino and a great place to bring your kids. Also features the world's largest indoor theme park - the Adventuredome, plus a whole host of shows, swimming pools, restaurants, lounges, bars, cafes and shopping options - and all at tremendous value!

The Excalibur Hotel & Casino, Las Vegas, is one of the world's most exciting family resorts. With its magical white castle, complete with moat and drawbridge. Offering a wealth of amenities including pools, restaurants, clubs, bars and spas in a luxurious and fantastical environment, it's a real Las Vegas winner!

Luxor is a stunning hotel & casino featuring a 30-story pyramid and two 22-story towers with a total of 4,408 rooms. Offering an idyllic oasis of four large swimming pools, an invigorating whirlpool and a state-of-the-art spa plus multiple food and entertainment venues on three different levels and a breathtaking hotel atrium.

NO RESORT FEES AT THIS PROPERTY! In operation since 1966, the Four Queens Hotel & Casino has a history of delivering high quality, traditional Las Vegas-style gaming and entertainment. Located in the heart of vibrant Downtown Las Vegas on Fremont Street and offering 690 rooms & suites and 32,000 sq. ft. of casino space this is a great value classic!

Harrah's Las Vegas Hotel, located at the heart of the strip, is an experience of luxury and excitement like no other. Offering 2,500 lavish rooms and suites and the famous Harrah's casino, plus seven exceptional restaurants, an Olympic size outdoor swimming pool, championship golf course and a state-of-the-art health club and spa.

A tropical-themed resort, with a casual, party atmosphere, Hooters Casino Hotel has hundreds of Hooters Girls in trademark orange shorts and white tops. These all-American cheerleaders serve food & drinks, greet guests and even deal cards. Yet there's more to Hooters than just eye candy with comfortable rooms and a variety of amenities.

The Golden Nugget is the largest and most extravagant Hotel Casino in Downtown Las Vegas and its four towers house a total of 2,300 beautifully decorated guest rooms and suites. For a high standard of style and comfort in one of the most exciting areas of Las Vegas, the Golden Nugget Hotel & Casino is the place for you.

A 24-hour party atmosphere reverberates through the vibrant red, purple and blue neon towers of the Rio Las Vegas, where large suites, exciting entertainment and incredible dining combine for the ultimate Vegas experience. With its Brazilian inspired beach pool, spa, bars and restaurants it really is carnival time, Rio style!

With elegant decor reminiscent of the world-renowned Monaco playground, Monte Carlo Hotel & Casino magnificently combines European refinement with American excitement. With over 3,000 luxurious rooms, AAA Four Diamond hospitality and 24-hour service, the Monte Carlo gives you the comfort and attention you'd expect and more.

Excellent hotel casino offering great value and high standards in an ideal, mid-Strip location. With a wealth of amenities including an oversized heated pool, whirlpools spas, championship tennis courts, restaurants, bars and luxury shopping and nearly 3,000 spacious and tastefully furnished guest rooms to choose from.

Stunning New York-themed casino hotel with an unbeatable central Strip location. Hailed as 'The Greatest City in Las Vegas,' New York New York Hotel has brought the magic of the original 'city that never sleeps' to the Nevada desert, home of the other city that never sleeps, through its recreation of traditional New York landmarks.

The all-new Tropicana features tastefully redesigned rooms in warm tones that evoke the casual luxury of a beach getaway. From stylish island guest rooms to the bars and lounge, Tropicana conveys the essence of relaxed, tropical glamour. Featuring an all-new pool area for summer 2010 plus a whole host of essential amenities and services.

The Hard Rock Hotel & Casino offers the energy and entertainment of Las Vegas with the services and amenities of a luxury hotel. Known for its innovative nightlife and music scene where world-famous acts such as The Rolling Stones have performed. A host of amenities and voted by Travel Channel as having one of the top 10 pools in the world.

Palms Casino Resort is Las Vegas Party Central with some of the city's most hip nightclubs, trendy bars and amazing restaurants. Home to the world's only Playboy Club, Palms attracts the young, hip and trendy and more than its fair share of celebrities at this popular off-strip casino resort.

Treasure Island - home of world-famous shows, exquisite dining, clubs, lounges and a host of other diversions to help you unwind or amp up - depending on your mood. This breadth of experiences - and the exceptional service - is why TI is only one of three Las Vegas resorts to win the AAA Four Diamond Award for at least 10 years.

The Flamingo, has anchored the Las Vegas Strip since they started rolling dice in 1946 and offering everything an adventurous vacationer could want; including a Wildlife Habitat and a 15-acre Caribbean-style water playground. This hotel combines heart-pounding Las Vegas excitement with hospitality and service that's second to none.

Luxury, Polynesian-themed resort with spectacular features including an erupting volcano! With a central Strip location, the Mirage offers 3400 beautifully refurbished guest rooms with marble bathrooms and mini bars. Also has a stunning tropical pool area, world-class health spa, 11 restaurants, a glamorous casino and 2 show theatres.

Step through the doors of MGM Grand and enter a pure, amplified and unforgettable Las Vegas experience. Guests feel as special as any celebrity and are part of the action - pampered by a courteous staff, immersed in luxury and invited to play day and night. Offers some of the largest standard guest rooms in Vegas and an array of suites.

Palms Place Hotel & Spa goes beyond what you'd expect from a Las Vegas hotel. Its 599 suites provide every convenience imaginable with breathtaking views of the 'Strip' and Spring Mountains. This non-gaming sanctuary is a welcomed retreat, but should your mood shift, the SkyTube connects you to 24-hour action at Palms Casino Resort.

The Signature at MGM Grand, a luxurious all-suite hotel opened in May 2006. A stylish addition to the MGM Grand portfolio, the Signature's suites are set within three beautiful and distinct towers and provides guests with a serene retreat and an intimate setting where the focus is on a providing you with a warm, personalised service.

Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino features accommodations fit for the celebrity A-List, and perfect for Hollywood buffs, as every room and suite features unique, one-of-a-kind movie memorabilia items. They're also equipped with all the high-tech necessities and other accoutrements that create an atmosphere of excitement, luxury & fame.

Vdara is a chic hotel with a sophisticated flair that appeals to guests who love the energy and excitement of Las Vegas, but choose to enjoy it from an exclusive, non-gaming environment. Vdara offers contemporary interior spaces with the very latest modern amenities; a rooftop pool and a two-level spa, salon & fitness centre.

Stay at The Westin Casuarina Las Vegas Hotel, Casino & Spa for a calm sanctuary amidst the glittering lights of Las Vegas. You'll enjoy the action and excitement of the famous Las Vegas Strip just one block away - and a quiet retreat whenever you need some peace, a swim in the outdoor heated pool or a pampering at the luxurious Hibiscus Spa.

From the soaring three-story lobby to the naturally lit casino, ARIA evokes openness and freedom. Art and interior design will greet guests in warm, comforting surroundings and provide a sense of human scale. Impeccable hospitality and personalised attention join with an incredible array of amenities to see to your every need.

Designed to bring the spirit and excitement of the city of Paris to Las Vegas. Stroll down the cobblestone sidewalks of the shopping district, enjoy the 85,000 square foot themed casino, or dine in one of the resort's 8 distinct French restaurants, one of which is located 100 ft up in the resort's replica 50-story half-scale Eiffel Tower.

The Trump Hotel Las Vegas provides the perfect blend of comfort, service and luxury. Experience floor-to-ceiling panoramic views of Las Vegas within spacious, modern suites; indulge with a relaxing treatment at the hotel spa; unwind with a workout in the fitness room and sample unforgettable cuisines at the exclusive gourmet restaurant.

NO RESORT FEES AT THIS PROPERTY! Welcome to the Elara hotel. Inside you'll find 52 stories of luxury complete with a state-of-the-art meeting facility, health club, and business centre. Step through the grand entrance to Planet Hollywood to find exceptional shopping, dining, gaming, and entertainment. Step outside to discover an exotic tropical pool surrounded by white sand.

Hotel.HotelName: Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino - A Venetian Property
Hotel.Brochurecontent: An opulent wonder of architecture and artistry, inspired by the beauty and charm of Renaissance Venice, Palazzo Resort Hotel & Casino is the jewel at the heart of the Las Vegas Strip. Whether your plans are for business or pleasure, relaxation or excitement, this hotel is Las Vegas' ultimate resort destination.

The Cromwell presents the Strip's first Las Vegas boutique hotel. Each of the 188 rooms features luxurious accommodations in an intimate, Parisian-inspired atmosphere. Whether it's the hardwood floors, plush furnishings or dim and romantic lighting, each room gives guests a glamorous, VIP experience.

Capturing the romance of Italy, The Venetian Resort Hotel & Casino is redefining Las Vegas with outstanding luxury and charm. Appealing to couples and luxury travelers, The Venetian is home to inspired restaurants to suit every taste, one of the best shopping experiences in Las Vegas, state-of-the-art gaming and heavenly Spa facilities.

The Cosmopolitan opened its doors to the public on December 15th 2010. Situated at the heart of the Las Vegas Strip, The Cosmopolitan, a two-tower, luxury five-star hotel is located directly between the stunning CityCenter complex and the Bellagio.

The world-famous Bellagio Hotel is an extravagant, luxury resort overlooking a magnificent lake and classical gardens. It has a prime location at the heart of the Las Vegas Strip with a choice of over 4,000 luxurious guest rooms, fabulous pool area and health spa, a heavenly selection of restaurants and world-class, luxury shopping.

Caesars Palace is one of the world's best known resort-casinos and is quintessential Las Vegas. Beautiful guestrooms ensure a restful haven between high-octane visits to the casinos and the world-famous Strip. Offering superior amenities, plus world-class dining, gambling, shopping, services, entertainment and nightlife.

NO RESORT FEES AT THIS PROPERTY! Treat yourself to an intriguing change of pace - where boutique luxury and sophisticated style merge beautifully just off the Strip - at the Platinum Hotel & Spa. Set your own agenda, at your own pace, within comfortable one- and two-bedroom Las Vegas hotel suites, in a soothing non-gaming, smoke-free environment.

Hotel.RoomType: Deluxe Resort King - No Resort Fee Charged
Hotel.Brochurecontent: Earning a place of honour and distinction on the Las Vegas Strip, the Wynn Las Vegas Resort is a 50-story luxury resort featuring inspired guestrooms & suites, signature restaurants, world-class luxury shopping, championship golf and exciting leisure activities and entertainment like the provocative water show, 'Le Reve'.

Hotel.HotelName: Encore at the Wynn Las Vegas
Hotel.RoomType: Resort Suite King - No Resort Fee Charged
Hotel.Brochurecontent: A lowcostUSA.co.uk favourite! Indulge your senses with yet another stunning Steve Wynn property on the World Famous Las Vegas Strip. This resort continues Wynn Las Vegas' casually elegant approach to ambiance and relaxation. Designed as a set of unique cosmopolitan neighbourhoods to be explored, discovered and enjoyed.

Hotel.RoomType: Cityscape- 1 King Bed Excl Golden Access Fee Double
Hotel.Brochurecontent: Mandarin Oriental, Las Vegas is an exceptional luxury 47-story hotel, located at the centre of the energetic Las Vegas Strip. This non-gaming oasis of oriental calm has a 23rd-floor sky lobby looking down on the city and offers 392 guest rooms and suites, each a model of sleek, contemporary design with subtle oriental touches.
Hotel.Deeplink: http://www.lowcostusa.co.uk/msholidayentp.aspx?destinationid=1&hotelid=19&room=Cityscape- 1 King Bed Excl Golden Access Fee Double&checkin=2015-08-19&duration=7&adt=2&origin=LON&air=UA&fltout=0959&fltin=0934

Hotel.RoomType: Superior 1 King Excl Resort Fee Double (family Plan)
Hotel.Brochurecontent: The Four Seasons, a AAA Five Diamond hotel, is a sanctuary from the dazzling Las Vegas Strip. With just 424 guestrooms & suites - all on the upper floors of the tower - you are assured a more intimate atmosphere and attentive personal service. The centrepiece of the Mandalay Bay Resort, with its own exclusive entrance and private elevators.
